resources.string: App Run Indicator And Killer (Ariak) was created for my personal usage. Some apps make it hard to determine if they are still running in the background. Skype for example is such an app where it is hard to tell if Skype is still running in the background and accepting calls. For these I wanted a way to be alerted so that the app can be shut down is so desired.
Use with care. No warranty of any kind is given.
